bug.author: lissyx
bug.description: From build log: <denchmark-code> /bin/bash -c 'source external/bazel_tools/tools/genrule/genrule-setup.sh; native_client/ds_git_version.sh >bazel-out/darwin-opt/genfiles/native_client/ds_version.h') INFO: From Executing genrule //native_client:ds_git_version: native_client/ds_git_version.sh: line 3: realpath: command not found native_client/ds_git_version.sh: line 3: realpath: command not found native_client/ds_git_version.sh: line 5: return: can only `return' from a function or sourced script </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
